segments.text: In this scene, the kitchen is detailed with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink area, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water flows steadily into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, creating a pool on the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains focused, not reacting to the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy uses a stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's inside the cookie jar with one hand, plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, reaching toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink reveals an outdoor garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, allowing light inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall setting feels like a typical household moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
